greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=a(2)=1, a(3)=6, a(n)=abs(a(n-1)-a(n-2)-a(n-3)).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: for n>=5 a(n^2+24*n-13)=0; for n>= 38 Max( a(k) : 1<=k<=n) = floor(sqrt(n+156))
program: a079624_list = 1 : 1 : 6 : zipWith3 (\u v w -> abs (w - v - u))
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 30 2003
